div.div: GFD checks the liveness of all replicas and then reports to RM about changes of the cluster.

div.div: The LFD would be aware of the failed or unreachable replica and report it to GFD, and GFD would notify RM.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 127px; height: 1px; padding-top: 381px; margin-left: 43px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Now GFD receives some updates from local FDs, and it would then notify RM about this update. RM will also send the new membership information to all alive replicas.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 331px; margin-left: 717px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
This replica is
not reachable and
its LFD will not get reply from it

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
